name: SHAHID BATALIYAN BAHUUDDESHIYA MANDAL
briefDescription: We started our work since 1999, Showcasing awareness about the Smoking and Drugs as our first Program for the people. We done with our Registration at 2015 as Charitable Society Act 1860 and by Bombay Public Trust act 1950. We are trying to make aware people about the wrong trends.We are working in the Nagpur District but our focus are the rural people who don’t get the benefits of the Government Projects and that’s why we have established Old Age Home, Orphanage Home, Naturopathy Training Center and all types of Training Center for women and Child and Rural People in the area of 18000 sq. ft., at MAHULI, Parsioni, Nagpur. Now we trying to give the more Benefit to the people of the global ere.
